titleStmt.title: The dumb lady; or, No, no, not I; I'le answer. To the tune of, the doubtful virgin, or the new Borey, or Will you be a man of fashion.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksy [sic] at the Golden-Ball in Pye-Corner.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
